name: Exa(Exter)mination
description:
Exa(Exter)mination is a game where you try your best to escape the exams. Jump from platform to platform and avoid the 'F's that are thrown at you.  Collect your grades to get a high score and eat candy to replenish your health.

Credits

Artist:Exe8810

Programmer:Maycorex

Special thanks to :ChinnyKian
